statements: DELETE FROM users WHERE age < 30 AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
DELETE FROM user_investments WHERE user_id = 1 AND investment_id = 3;
DELETE FROM user_investments WHERE user_id = 2 AND investment_id = 4;
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 101 AND risk_tolerance = 'High';
DELETE FROM investments WHERE amount_invested > 5000 AND date_invested < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score < 3.0 AND date_recommendation_generated > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM investments WHERE investment_id IN (SELECT investment_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 5000);
